TunableVariant.name: guaranteed_content
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, will force content set generation to add options for this topic.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: If enabled, will force content set generation to add options for this topic.

Tunable.name: count
Tunable.description: The number of options to force into the content set.

Tunable.name: priority
Tunable.description: The priority of this Topic vs. other Topics. Ties are randomized.

Tunable.name: is_timed_relevancy
Tunable.description: If set, relevancy value is treated as number of minutes until topic is removed.

TunableVariant.name: relevancy_value
TunableVariant.description: Initial Decay value once value has reached zero topic will be removed. If is_timeout is set, this will the number of minutes before topic will timeout.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A literal value that is to be used as the lower and upper bound of an interval. This allows both literal and range interval tunings in the same TunableVariant without having to manually set the lower and upper bounds to the same value.

TunableTuple.name: random_in_range
TunableTuple.description: A tunable interval between lower_bound and upper_bound.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: score_bonus
Tunable.description: Score bonus for matching topic tag.
